Name: Louisiana Trade
Ingredients: 60 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: Peach and apricot with the freshness of lime and the dense sweetness of maple syrup.
History: Created in 2001 by Mahdi Otmann at Zeta, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Louisiana Trade contains 236 calories
